title: Enhancing Learning Design Practical Skills: Writing Instruction Design Based on Intertextuality in Multicultural Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply a framework to analyze intertextuality in multicultural contexts.
Learners can design intertextual writing strategies that integrate learners’ background knowledge.
Learners can develop text-based inquiry-driven lesson models applicable to real educational settings.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
